translations: n.[地理] 干河床；溪流；[地理] 干谷

phrs.translation: 干谷, 旱谷, 河道
瓦地伦, 瓦迪拉姆, 月亮峡谷, 月亮谷
疯狂河道, 水上乐园, 疯狂维迪水上乐园, 野外溪流水上公园

sentences.sentence: WADI also provides the concept of farming.
Wadi Hitan is a beautiful but unforgiving place.
sentences.translation: “鲸之谷”是一个美丽而冷酷的地方。

sentences.sentence: So, as you see, WADI is part of the solution, not the whole solution.
sentences.translation: 所以可以看出，WADI是解决方案的一部分，而不是整体解决方案。
